mapper.select: SELECT ca.cateid, ca.catename, it.itemid, it.itemname, it.itemimg, it.itemplace, it.itemguide, it.itemticket, it.estart,it.efin FROM item AS it INNER JOIN cate AS ca ON it.cateid=ca.cateid WHERE it.itemid=#{itemid}

SELECT ca.cateid, ca.catename, it.itemid, it.itemname, it.itemimg, it.itemplace, it.itemguide, it.itemticket, io.obj, io.price, it.estart,it.efin FROM item AS it INNER JOIN cate AS ca ON ca.cateid=it.cateid INNER JOIN itemoption AS io ON io.itemid=it.itemid
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET cateid=#{cateid}, itemname=#{itemname},itemplace=#{itemplace} WHERE itemid=#{itemid}
